`r knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache=TRUE, fig.width = 10, fig.height = 10)`

```{r}
library(bipartite)
```

```{r}
plotweb_v2(Safariland, srt = 90)
```

```{r}
plotweb_v2(Safariland,
           horizontal = TRUE)
```

```{r}
plotweb_v2(Safariland,
           srt = 90,
           curved_links = TRUE)
```

```{r}
web <- matrix(runif(15, min = 0, max = 30), nrow = 3)
plotweb_v2(web)
plotweb_v2(Safariland, spacing = 0.1, plot_axes = T)
plotweb_v2(web, srt = 90)
```
